job_title: Oracle SQL/ Oracle PL/SQL Backend Developer with .Net
jd: Hi, This is Syed Khalid from SS33 Business Services working as a Technical Recruiter, I have this present requirement with me given below are the details. Do respond back to this email with your updated resume. Title: Oracle SQL/ Oracle PL/SQL Backend Developer with .Net for Web Services Development Location: Houston, Texas (3 days onsite and 2 days remote) (This is a hybrid and not remote role)Type of Hire: CTH (Contract to Hire)Duration of the project : 1 yearCommunication skills: Good Skills:SkillsNo. Of years of ExperienceYear Last workedTotal No. of Years of Experience No. of Years of Experience as a Backend developer No. of Years of Experience 4+ years of experience in Oracle SQL and Oracle PL/SQL development. Strong experience in writing and optimizing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, functions, and packages. Must Have Basic experience with .Net (C#) for developing and maintaining web services. Must have Experience with web services frameworks (e.g., ASP.NET, Web API). Familiarity with Oracle database tools such as SQL Developer, SQL*Plus, or Toad. Good understanding of REST/SOAP web services and how they interact with back-end databases. Experience in troubleshooting, debugging, and resolving database-related issues.
